column5: NICE!!!
absolute tank, good catch
Wow. What a monster.
Sweet!!
What a tank!  Got any measurements?
That is a beautiful thing.
Wow, that's huge!  Congrats.
wow what a tank

A monstrous specimen, I've caught large crappie but now I have a different perspective of large. It's nice to see your arms tucked in for the pic of the 2 beauties.  Did you get a weight and measurement,? it really doesn't matter large is big but it would be nice to know.  That smile must be cramping up by now, it will take a while for it to go away.  Way to go kiddo. Smile and be proud, you deserve it.
nice
What a beast!!
What a tank!  Got any measurements?  Likely just an 11" fish with an 8 incher for comparison. He just has his arms stretched out as far as possible                                     Nice fish!

thanks everyone for the positive feedback! still in awe of this fish. the thing was 15 inches long and FAT most likely full of eggs! i fish this lake lots so she went back in hopes i can catch her again when shes pushing 16 LOL have never seen one this big around here so it gives me hope that there are even bigger! cheers
I have never caught one that big and I love crappies. Nice fish!!!!!! However, my 11 year daughter caught a 16"er soon after ice out. It looked like a largemouth at first.
Last time I seen one that HUGE, was the one my son caught on a local lake.  Nice SLAB. Nice on the release as well.
Good job on releasing that brute!
Whoa...Nicely done!
well i know i cant post the word that i said when i saw the picture, but wow what a tank.

Any details for us?  Using a flasher?  Over weeds?  Bait?  etc.  Or if it's all information you want to keep to yourself I'll mind my own business.  I have caught many hundreds of crappies and never saw one that big I don't think.  Beauty!  Doug

Any details for us?  Using a flasher?  Over weeds?  Bait?  etc.  Or if it's all information you want to keep to yourself I'll mind my own business.  I have caught many hundreds of crappies and never saw one that big I don't think.  Beauty!  Doug i like to fish these guys over drops or main lake basins. i use a vexilar fl 12 and suspend 5 feet up. you will see em roll in! the hot jig this season has been a tungsten diamond jig in glow white with maggots... enjoy

i like to fish these guys over drops or main lake basins. i use a vexilar fl 12 and suspend 5 feet up. you will see em roll in! the hot jig this season has been a tungsten diamond jig in glow white with maggots... enjoy  You sir, have found the most fun ice fishing method for catching crappies. Very nice fish.
THANKS!  Do you keep the maggots lively by storing them in your mouth, like the old timers?  Doug
Beaut
